comment: Brewed on 1/9/14.  The AA's on the hops are off because I had to reenter this recipe after I brewed this because it didn't save the first time.  The bittering hops were 13%(citra).

Also, those IBUs are probable off.  It's likely lower.  The citra hops were pretty old (though they smelled fine) and my boil volume was lower than usual.  I think it was around 3.5 gallon, maybe a bit less by flameout.
